INCIDENTS.title: Weather disruption near Zernez Scuol-Tarasp, station
INCIDENTS.subtitle: Requesting all the trains that are supposed to stop at Platform 4 to use Platform 5 instead.
INCIDENTS.description: A signal failure at Zurich HB is causing delays of up to 30 minutes on multiple routes. Repair teams are on-site.

INCIDENTS.title: Landslide near Interlaken Ost
INCIDENTS.subtitle: Severe weather conditions near Zernez and Scuol-Tarasp stations have disrupted train services. Authorities are working to assess the damage and resume normal operations as soon as possible
INCIDENTS.description: A landslide has blocked the tracks near Interlaken Ost, suspending train services between Interlaken Ost and Grindelwald.

INCIDENTS.title: Power Failure at Lausanne Station
INCIDENTS.subtitle: Requesting all the trains that are supposed to stop at Platform 4 to use Platform 5 instead.
INCIDENTS.description: A power outage at Lausanne station is affecting train departures. Expect delays of up to 45 minutes.

INCIDENTS.title: Delayed train at Davos latz middle station
INCIDENTS.subtitle: Requesting all the trains that are supposed to stop at Platform 4 to use Platform 5 instead.
INCIDENTS.description: Due to a technical issue, all trains to Zurich HB from Bern are departing from Platform 7 instead of Platform 4.

INCIDENTS.title: Track Maintenance near Bellinzona
INCIDENTS.subtitle: A track obstruction near Kublis station has caused delays in train services. Efforts are underway to clear the obstruction and restore normal operations
INCIDENTS.description: Routine track maintenance is being carried out near Bellinzona. Some trains may experience slight delays.

INCIDENTS.title: Maintenance work at t.Mortiz
INCIDENTS.subtitle: Requesting all the trains that are supposed to stop at Platform 4 to use Platform 5 instead.
INCIDENTS.description: Routine track maintenance is being carried out near Bellinzona. Some trains may experience slight delays.

INCIDENTS.title: Track obstruction near Kublis station
INCIDENTS.subtitle: Requesting all the trains that are supposed to stop at Platform 4 to use Platform 5 instead.
INCIDENTS.description: Routine track maintenance is being carried out near Bellinzona. Some trains may experience slight delays.
